name: Mike Clarke
text: Always a great stuffed crust pizza from this location.  I have never had an order that was incorrect.  The manager is awesome.  He has his staff hopping and trained well.

name: Jodi Sexton
text: I recently ordered from Pizza Hut online. My order was not accurate when I received it, so I simply called and asked to speak with a Manager. I explained the situation and he not only was kind enough to send another driver to replace my …More

name: Marcus Drake
text: The  staff  are all very  nice  and  friendly. The  Manger  was also  very  nice  and  friendly. I would  visit  that pizza hut again!

name: Afril Trueheart
text: This hasn't been a pizza hut for a while. Why hasn't anyone removed pizza hut from this location. Now it is an El Ranchero, which in my opinion is way better then the pizza hut it was.

name: Nate Busch
text: Great service, very attentive. Atmosphere isn't bad and I left satisfied.

name: Jamie Rhine
text: It's not Pizza Hut anymore ... They were slow, but their new, good food though.

name: Jessica Turpin
text: Great food, fast service and really good desserts

name: Brandon Brooks
text: Fantastic pizza and some of the best service I have ever encountered. Fred is a real keeper for this Pizza Hut. I will be making the drive across town to eat here.

name: Steve Winkler
text: Couldn't sell beer, wings undercooked, I had to stop the toilet from running. Could have gone anywhere in Bloomington and picked the wrong place.

name: Max Goodlow
text: This came from my friends visiting, they called and asked the person do they deliver to my area his response was what landmarks are around you they said they didn't now then they asked don't you need a address he said no he needed a …More

name: Kimberly Miller
text: I spoke with the manager about food poisoning and he was totally dismissive of my experience. Don't eat the marinara pasta. That is all.

name: debra bradley
text: This is no longer pizza hut Google!! Mexican restaurant.

name: Zechariah Garrette
text: Decent pizza, seems to miss the mark on many aspects.
